Function to say hello

I define my greetings function.

{% raw %}

say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say hello to somebody

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Examples

Here an example

{% raw %} 
say_hello("Sylvain")

'Hello Sylvain!'
{% endraw %}

Tests

I add my tests.

{% raw %} 
assert say_hello("Jeremy") == "Hello Jeremy!"
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
